title: An Act authorizing automated curb enforcement and improving parking violation procedures

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Cusack of Braintree, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Mark J. Cusack for legislation to authorize automated curb enforcement and improving parking violation procedures.  Transportation.
